price: Basi ukawasibu uovu wa waliyo yachuma. Na wale walio dhulumu miongoni mwa hawa utawasibu uovu wa waliyo yachuma vile vile. Nao si wenye kushinda.
arabic: فَأَصَابَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
footnotes: Yakawasibu makafiri walio tangulia malipo ya madhambi ya vitendo vyao, na madhaalimu miongoni mwa hawa wanao semezwa hivi sasa yatawapata vile vile malipo ya madhambi ya vitendo vyao. Wala hawa hawataiepuka adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-aṣābahum sayyiātu mā kasabū wa-alladhīna ẓalamū min hāulāi sayuṣībuhum sayyiātu mā kasabū wamā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
